org.jfree.report.demo.util
Interface DemoController

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDemoFrame
public interface DemoController

The DemoControler interface provides limited access to the containing demo frame. This way, a DemoPreviewHandler is able to control the export action or the contents of the statusbar.

Author:
Thomas Morgner
